coreAtributes.name: knee-high leather jack boots
coreAtributes.description: A pair of leather knee high jack boots with a sturdy metal high heel. They have a authortarian appeal to them while still maintaining a feminine appeal, designed for high ranking demons back in the day, they were literaly made to walk all over people.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off your leather jack boots.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name]'s [npc.feet] and roughly pull [npc.her] jack boots off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs your [pc.feet] and roughly pulls your jack boots off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs [npc2.name]'s [npc2.feet] and roughly pulls [npc2.name]'s jack boots off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You push your feet into the leather jack boots and pull them up to your knees.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.feet] into the leather jack boots and pull them up to [npc.her] knees.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the leather jack boots and pull them up to [npc.her] knees.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the leather jack boots and pulls them up to [npc.her] knees.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.feet] into the leather jack boots, before pulling up to your knees.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces your [pc.feet] into the leather jack boots and pull them up to your knees.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.feet] into the leather jack boots, before pulling up to [npc2.her] knees.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.name]'s [npc2.feet] into the leather jack boots, before pulling up to [npc2.her] knees.
